sections.title: Further reading

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: This section consists entirely of references and does not mention any specific genes, hence this requirement is not applicable.
The section solely contains citations, and there is no use of gene abbreviations in these citations.
The section focuses on references and does not involve human gene names.
The section does not refer to any orthologs of human genes in other species.
This section does not discuss gene regulation, focusing instead on literature references.
The content in this section does not mention any non-human genes or their regulation.
Scientific names are not present within this section as it only contains reference citations.
The language used in references does not require consistency in British or American English for this section.
The section is comprised of bibliographic citations and does not involve first-person language.

sections.meta_notes: This section serves as a bibliographic reference list, with no applicability to language-specific requirements outside of citation accuracy.
